name: VR Pterosaur
description:
This is a VR shooting leisure game. Dinosaurs in the player's perspective in the game need to protect their eggs from being destroyed within the specified time to win the game. Note that during this period, other dinosaurs will come to destroy the eggs in the nest, which hinders you to win the game. Players need to control the handle and sniper the dinosaurs that come to attack. game over. Protect your eggs!

Operation method:
Runch of any handle trigger key
Flying left handle up/down key
Power -renewed right handle up/down key
Weighing any handle grip key
